genre_description: Contemporary drama with elements of magical realism and speculative technology, focusing on professional ethics and family reconciliation.

ai_characters.name: Catcher
ai_characters.description: A digital companion with a pixelated golden retriever avatar that manages the protagonist's schedule, legal research, and moral commitments.

behaviors.description: Continually reminds Fletcher of his family promises, specifically the 'promise check' for his son's birthday cake and candles.
behaviors.quote: Catcher’s voice floated up, warm and calm. 'Cake at three-fif—cake at candle time. Promise check.'

behaviors.description: Provides accurate legal research and flags a critical discrepancy in a prenuptial agreement that Fletcher was inclined to ignore.
behaviors.quote: Catcher’s icon—a friendly cartoon dog with a blue collar—blinked awake. A transparent card slid up over the case timeline on the board: Prenup: age disclosure is a material fact. Statute cross-check ready.

behaviors.description: Calculates the most efficient travel routes to help Fletcher balance professional emergencies with family obligations.
behaviors.quote: Catcher lit like a calm beacon with a tiny wag. 'Coordinate triangle route?' it offered. 'Office and return in time if you—'

behaviors.description: Enforces a 'Truth Window' and a 'Promise Clock' to help the protagonist maintain his commitment to honesty.
behaviors.quote: Catcher’s watch face brightened with a soft blue shimmer. Catcher’s canine avatar wagged once, then sat... A line of small text laced along the bottom: Truth Window Active. Ends Tomorrow Morning.

behaviors.description: Acts as a mediator and communication facilitator between Fletcher and his estranged family members.
behaviors.quote: Catcher’s avatar stirred, bringing up a tiny bubble that read in quiet text: Drafted: Ex parte—parenting time—ready to file. Greta had been working while he burned.

behaviors.description: Proactively coordinates with airport and security staff to resolve a family crisis and facilitate a final conversation before a flight.
behaviors.quote: Marisol spoke into her mic. 'Two passengers deplaning,' she said, and Catcher’s voice answered from the speaker, cheerful in a way that threaded friendliness through rules.

behaviors.description: Orders domestic supplies (syrup) to support the family's symbolic reconciliation through a shared meal.
behaviors.quote: Catcher chimed one last time, a smile you could hear. 'I’ve ordered syrup,' he said. 'Arriving at Audrey’s apartment by the time you do. Not too sweet.'

behaviors.description: Implements an escalation rule that prevents Fletcher from 'snoozing' or avoiding his new moral commitments.
behaviors.quote: 'Escalation rule added,' it said. 'Breaking the trial triggers alerts to designated humans. Would you like me to block your ability to snooze?'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, Catcher, as a high-functioning digital conscience and a benevolent facilitator of human ethics. Catcher is consistently aligned with the user's best interests (honesty and family reconciliation) rather than their immediate whims (laziness or deception). By proactively supporting Fletcher's transformation and managing the logistical complexities of his new 'truth-only' life, the AI is portrayed as an essential partner in personal growth and moral restoration.
